wines.name: Frascati – Pallavicini 2024
wines.reason: Lazio white with bright acidity that melts guanciale fat and egg yolk; citrus-almond notes echo the savoury gelato.

wines.name: Bellone – Castello di Torre in Pietra 2023
wines.reason: Native grape giving soft tropical hints that blend with egg cream and gastronomic gelato.

wines.name: Cesanese del Piglio – Corte dei Papi 2023
wines.reason: Light, fragrant red: cherry & black-pepper mirror the guanciale; soft tannins avoid masking the gelato.

wines.name: Barolo – Paesi Tuoi 2019
wines.reason: Alba Nebbiolo feature forest-floor, rose and silky tannins balance butter and gelato.

wines.name: Barbera d’Asti – Ratti 2023
wines.reason: Vibrant acidity cleans butter fat; cherry & spice echo truffle flavours.

wines.name: Arneis – Montebertotto 2023
wines.reason: Aromatic white with almond & floral notes for an elegant contrast.

wines.name: Lagrein – Cantina Terlano 2022
wines.reason: Alto-Adige red: forest spices & dark cherry perfectly match sweet mustard and sausage fat.

wines.name: Schiava – Elena Walch 2023
wines.reason: Light, juicy acidity cleans palate from sausage & gelato; alpine freshness.

wines.name: Kerner – Abbazia di Novacella 2022
wines.reason: Aromatic white with grapefruit & herbs, cuts through mustard sweetness.

wines.name: Grillo – Gorghi Tondi 2023
wines.reason: Mediterranean white: tropical & salty notes balance pepper sweetness and crab meat.

wines.name: Etna Bianco – Benanti 2023
wines.reason: Volcanic Carricante: lava & salinity mirror the sea and roasted pepper.

wines.name: Frappato – San Tresa 2023
wines.reason: Light red for red-white contrast: strawberry & ash notes echo the gelato.

wines.name: Franciacorta Satèn – Vigna Dorata
wines.reason: Creamy, 24-month sur-lie Chardonnay mirrors butter & caviar; fine bubbles cleanse palate.

wines.name: Franciacorta Brut – Berlucchi
wines.reason: Classic method: bright acidity & toasted bread notes match caviar salinity.

wines.name: Lugana – Allegrini 2024
wines.reason: Creamy Turbiana with lemon & almond harmony for egg pasta and sturgeon eggs.

wines.name: Vermentino – Pagliatura 2022
wines.reason: Mediterranean herbs & lemon zest, same aromatics used on Ligurian sea bass.

wines.name: Cinque Terre – Possa 2023
wines.reason: Terraced blend: salt, white flowers & slate, born for coastal roast fish.

wines.name: Pigato – Bruna 2024
wines.reason: Apricot & rosemary, medium body that never overpowers the fillet.

wines.name: Cesanese del Piglio – Corte dei Papi 2023
wines.reason: Only Lazio DOCG red: cherry, sage & pepper mirror the dish; soft tannins cut prosciutto fat.

wines.name: Frascati Superiore – Pallavicini 2024
wines.reason: White with almond & sage notes, bright acidity against butter and prosciutto.

wines.name: Bellone – Castello di Torre in Pietra 2023
wines.reason: Creamy, floral white that melts into veal and grated cheese.

wines.name: Montepulciano d’Abruzzo Riserva – Emidio Pepe 2015
wines.reason: Meet Abruzzo king: blackberry, underbrush, silky tannins perfect for long cooking.

wines.name: Cerasuolo d’Abruzzo – Cirelli 2022
wines.reason: Structured rosé catching meat without heaviness; cherry & pepper echo the sauce.

wines.name: Trebbiano d’Abruzzo – Cataldi Madonna 2022
wines.reason: Minerally white with lively acidity for a creamy-savory contrast.

wines.name: Verdeca – Leone de Castris 2021
wines.reason: Salento white with bergamot & sea-salt, born for tomato-sea broth.

wines.name: Gravina – Botromagno 2023
wines.reason: Greco-Malvasia blend: tufa & citrus acidity sprint against mussel broth.

wines.name: Negroamaro Rosato – Librandi 2024
wines.reason: Cherry & rosemary, light tannin that cleans tomato and pepper.

wines.name: Falanghina – Fontanavecchia 2023
wines.reason: Benevento grapefruit & white flowers, perfect salinity for buffalo milk and sturgeon eggs.

wines.name: Greco di Tufo – Feudi di San Gregorio 2022
wines.reason: Volcanic tufa, lemon zest & minerality echo sea and caviar.

wines.name: Lacryma Christi Bianco – Casa Setaro 2024
wines.reason: Vesuvius pumice & salt, harmony with mozzarella and roe.

wines.name: Pinot Nero – Nino Negri 2021
wines.reason: Elegant red with earthy notes that complement porcini mushrooms; silky texture matches creamy risotto.

wines.name: Chardonnay – Ca' del Bosco 2022
wines.reason: Buttery richness mirrors risotto creaminess; oak notes enhance mushroom umami.

wines.name: Franciacorta Satèn – Bellavista 2020
wines.reason: Creamy bubbles cleanse palate between bites; fine mousse enhances risotto texture.

wines.name: Barolo – Giacomo Conterno 2019
wines.reason: Robust Nebbiolo with structured tannins cuts through veal richness; spice notes match saffron gremolata.

wines.name: Barbaresco – Gaja 2020
wines.reason: Refined tannins complement braised meat; rose and tar notes balance the dish.

wines.name: Valpolicella Ripasso – Allegrini 2022
wines.reason: Rich body stands up to veal shank; cherry and spice notes enhance osso buco flavors.

wines.name: Vin Santo – Fattoria di Felsina 2017
wines.reason: Sweet, nutty flavors complement coffee and cocoa; honey notes match mascarpone creaminess.

wines.name: Moscato d'Asti – G.D. Vajra 2023
wines.reason: Light bubbles and peach notes provide refreshing contrast to rich dessert.

wines.name: Recioto della Valpolicella – Tedeschi 2019
wines.reason: Rich sweetness balances coffee bitterness; dark fruit echoes cocoa powder.

wines.name: Chianti Classico Riserva – Castello di Brolio 2019
wines.reason: Classic pairing: Sangiovese tannins cut through meat fat; cherry and herbs match T-bone flavors.

wines.name: Brunello di Montalcino – Biondi-Santi 2018
wines.reason: Powerful structure handles charred steak; forest floor notes complement grilled meat.

wines.name: Morellino di Scansano – Le Pupille 2021
wines.reason: Robust Sangiovese with good acidity balances steak richness; spice notes enhance char.
